description: Schema that describes a Bighorn event.

property.description: The name of the property with an error

trigger.description: The event trigger. For example, the DOM event.

type.description: The event type (an additional qualifier to help distinguish events).

info.description: Additional event information (placeholder for custom event data).

host.description: The page or API endpoint (without scheme & querystring) where the event was triggered.

target.description: The page or API endpoint (without scheme & querystring) where traffic or data is being sent.

partner.description: The name of the partner receiving the traffic or data.

utm_source.description: The attributable source of the event (may be different than the current visit).

utm_campaign.description: The attributable campaign (may be different than the current visit).

utm_medium.description: The attributable medium (may be different than the current visit).

utm_content.description: The attributable content (may be different than the current visit).

utm_term.description: The attributable term (may be different than the current visit).
